title.en: Prism Spectrums: The Dance of Refraction

description.ko: 유리 프리즘을 통과하는 백색광이 화려한 무지개 스펙트럼으로 갈라지는 놀라운 시각화입니다. 이 장면은 광학의 물리적 아름다움과 분산된 빛의 천상적인 광채를 담아냅니다.
description.en: A stunning visualization of white light passing through a glass prism, breaking into a vibrant rainbow spectrum. The scene captures the physical beauty of optics and the ethereal glow of dispersed light.

prompt: A macro cinematic shot of a triangular glass prism on a dark minimalist surface. A sharp beam of white light enters from the left, refracting through the glass and exiting as a wide, vivid rainbow spectrum. High-end optics, caustic light effects, 8k resolution, photorealistic, chromatic aberration, ethereal atmosphere.
